prompt: Club dance floor with green laser beams shooting from top to bottom and sweeping side to side. Several women and men are dancing out of focus in the background, colorful fog drifting across the floor.
Underground nightclub with deep purple and magenta neon lights pulsing to a beat. Thick fog rolls across a glossy black dance floor while strobe lights flash intermittently.
VIP lounge area of a high-end nightclub with golden ambient lighting and floating particle effects. LED strips along the walls shift between warm colors while subtle smoke wisps drift upward.
Massive warehouse rave with criss-crossing laser beams in blue, green, and red cutting through dense fog. Silhouettes of dancers sway in the far background under spinning disco ball reflections.
Intimate jazz club atmosphere with warm amber spotlights and slowly swirling cigarette smoke. Soft bokeh lights twinkle in the background while a subtle blue wash illuminates the back wall.

Neon-drenched dance club with a massive LED ceiling panel cycling through vibrant pink, cyan, and electric blue patterns. Dry ice fog creeps along the reflective floor creating an ethereal floating effect.
Open-air beach club at night with hanging string lights swaying gently in the breeze. Tiki torches flicker on either side while the moonlit ocean waves crash softly in the distant background.
Futuristic nightclub with holographic projections floating in mid-air, shifting between geometric shapes. The floor pulses with reactive light panels that ripple outward in concentric circles.
Rooftop club overlooking a glittering city skyline at night. DJ booth LED panels flash rhythmically while confetti and metallic streamers drift slowly through warm stage lighting.

Grand K-pop concert stage with sweeping spotlights and massive curved LED screens displaying colorful geometric animations. Fog machines create dramatic columns of light while pyrotechnic sparks fountain upward.

Arena concert stage viewed from the crowd, with thousands of phone flashlights swaying like stars. Giant LED walls display flowing abstract visuals in pink and purple while moving head lights sweep across the venue.
Intimate concert venue with warm stage lighting and a brick back wall. Spotlights in amber and rose gold create overlapping circles while gentle haze catches every beam of light.

Stadium concert with massive vertical LED pillars flanking the stage, displaying synchronized wave patterns. CO2 jets blast upward periodically while confetti cannons shower golden particles from above.
Music festival main stage at sunset with giant LED screens and towering speaker stacks. Flames burst from the stage edges while colored spotlights sweep dramatically across billowing smoke.
Futuristic holographic concert stage with transparent LED panels floating at different depths. Laser arrays create a cage of light beams while the floor projects rippling water-like reflections.

Outdoor amphitheater concert at twilight with string lights draped overhead. Warm golden spotlights illuminate falling flower petals while the dusky sky transitions from orange to deep violet in the background.

K-pop comeback stage with a massive rotating LED backdrop displaying kaleidoscopic visuals. Moving head lights create sharp beam patterns through theatrical haze while the polished stage floor reflects every light source.

Underground concert venue with exposed industrial pipes and brick walls lit by dramatic side lighting. Red and blue gels create moody shadows while a single powerful spotlight cuts through thick atmospheric haze.
Rain-soaked cyberpunk city alley at night with flickering neon signs in Japanese and Korean characters. Puddles on the ground reflect the pink and blue neon glow while steam rises from street grates.

Futuristic neon-lit city rooftop with holographic billboards floating in the distance. Rain falls steadily through beams of colorful light while flying vehicles streak across the dark sky leaving light trails.

Cyberpunk underground market corridor with dense neon signage in vibrant magenta and electric cyan. Holographic advertisements flicker and glitch while crowds of silhouettes move through the smoky atmosphere.

Neon-drenched Tokyo-inspired street at night with towering LED billboards and animated advertisements. Light rain creates shimmering reflections on the wet asphalt while paper lanterns sway in the wind.

Futuristic cityscape viewed through a rain-streaked window, with distant skyscrapers covered in animated neon advertisements. Water droplets slowly run down the glass while the city lights blur and sparkle behind them.
Dark cyberpunk alleyway with a single malfunctioning neon sign casting flickering purple light. Sparks occasionally fall from exposed wiring above while steam vents periodically blast from the walls.

Massive cyberpunk city intersection viewed from above, with streams of neon-lit traffic flowing in all directions. Giant holographic koi fish swim through the air between buildings while rain creates a misty glow around every light source.

Abandoned cyberpunk subway station with broken neon tubes sparking intermittently. Bioluminescent graffiti on the walls slowly pulses with an inner glow while a distant train light approaches through the tunnel fog.

Breathtaking sunset over a calm ocean with the sky painted in vivid orange, pink, and purple gradients. Gentle waves lap at a sandy beach while palm tree silhouettes sway slowly in the tropical breeze.

Cherry blossom trees in full bloom with soft pink petals drifting slowly through warm golden sunlight. A gentle breeze creates waves of falling petals against a soft-focus background of more blossoming trees.
Vivid northern lights dancing across a dark arctic sky in ribbons of green, purple, and blue. Stars twinkle behind the aurora while the lights reflect off a still frozen lake below.

Enchanted forest clearing at golden hour with sunbeams piercing through the canopy, creating god rays through floating dust particles. Fireflies begin to emerge, dotting the scene with warm yellow flickers.

Tropical waterfall cascading into a turquoise lagoon surrounded by lush green vegetation. Mist rises from where the water meets the pool, creating soft rainbows in the dappled sunlight filtering through the trees.

Vast lavender field at sunset with the purple flowers swaying gently in waves. The golden hour light creates long shadows while butterflies flutter between the blooms and distant mountains glow in warm light.

Dramatic thunderstorm over rolling green hills with lightning bolts illuminating towering cumulonimbus clouds. Rain curtains sweep across the landscape while occasional breaks in the clouds let through shafts of golden light.
Serene bamboo forest with tall green stalks swaying and creaking in a gentle wind. Dappled sunlight shifts and moves across the path as the bamboo moves, with occasional leaves drifting down slowly.

Autumn forest with trees ablaze in red, orange, and gold. Leaves gently detach and spiral downward through shafts of warm afternoon sunlight while a light breeze sends cascades of foliage across the scene.

Swirling vortex of luminous geometric shapes in neon pink, electric blue, and bright yellow rotating slowly. Triangles, hexagons, and circles pulse with inner light while trailing glowing particle streams behind them.

Infinite tunnel of concentric neon rings in alternating colors zooming toward the viewer. Each ring pulses and rotates independently while sparkling particles flow through the center creating a hypnotic depth effect.

Abstract paint splashes in vivid colors exploding outward in slow motion against a dark background. Droplets of luminous pink, cyan, and gold liquid float and merge while creating ethereal swirling patterns.

Kaleidoscopic mandala pattern slowly rotating and morphing, with fractal edges that breathe and expand. Colors shift continuously through the rainbow spectrum while crystalline reflections multiply the pattern infinitely.

Flowing ribbons of liquid chrome and iridescent color weaving through black space. The metallic surfaces reflect and refract light creating prismatic rainbows while the ribbons undulate in slow graceful waves.

Massive grid of glowing cubes in a dark void, each pulsing with different colors in a wave pattern that ripples outward from the center. The cubes rotate and shift heights creating a living equalizer visualization.

Ethereal watercolor washes blending and flowing across the frame in soft gradients of coral, lavender, and mint. Golden flecks and sparkles drift through the translucent layers as the colors slowly morph and shift.

Bold pop-art inspired background with concentric circles radiating outward in alternating hot pink and yellow. Comic book style halftone dots pulse and shift while starburst patterns flash dramatically.

Enchanted forest at twilight with bioluminescent mushrooms casting soft blue and purple light. Magical fairy lights drift lazily through the air while glowing wisps trace spiral paths between ancient moss-covered trees.

Crystal cavern with massive translucent formations refracting light into dancing rainbow patterns on the walls. Water drips from stalactites creating ripples in luminous pools while floating crystal shards rotate slowly in the air.

Magical floating islands in a purple twilight sky with waterfalls cascading off their edges into misty clouds below. Glowing lanterns drift upward between the islands while aurora-like ribbons of light weave between them.

Ancient magical library with floating books that open and close, their pages glowing with golden light. Sparkles and runes drift upward from the books while enchanted candles flicker with blue and green flames.

Fairy tale castle ballroom with towering stained glass windows casting colorful light patterns across a marble floor. Enchanted chandeliers slowly rotate overhead while magical sparkles rain down like gentle snow.

Mystical garden at night with enormous glowing flowers that slowly open and close, releasing luminous pollen. Tiny fairy lights weave between the flower stems while a crescent moon casts silver light through drifting clouds.

Dragon's treasure hoard with mountains of gold coins and gems catching flickering firelight. Magical flames in purple and blue dance across the treasure while floating embers and sparkles drift upward in warm currents.

Ethereal spirit realm with translucent aurora curtains flowing in an unseen wind. Glowing orbs of different colors drift peacefully through the space while the ground appears to be made of softly pulsing starlight.

Magical winter wonderland with ice sculptures that glow from within in shades of blue and violet. Snowflakes drift in slow spiraling patterns while the northern lights ripple across the sky in emerald and magenta.
Vibrant graffiti-covered brick wall in an urban alley with warm street lamp lighting. Shadows shift as car headlights pass by in the background while steam rises from a nearby manhole cover.

City rooftop at night with the sprawling skyline glittering in the background. Water towers and antenna silhouettes frame the scene while distant building lights twinkle and occasional helicopter lights cross the sky.

Busy city crosswalk at night shot from a low angle with colorful neon store signs reflected in rain puddles. Blurred pedestrians pass by while traffic lights change colors and taxi headlights streak past.

Underground parking garage with harsh fluorescent lighting casting long shadows. Concrete pillars recede into the distance while flickering lights and the glow of distant car taillights create a moody atmosphere.

Colorful mural-painted basketball court at golden hour in an urban park. The warm light creates long shadows while leaves from nearby trees drift across the painted concrete and a chain-link fence sways gently.

Neon-lit convenience store exterior at night in a quiet urban street. The warm glow from inside spills onto the wet sidewalk while a vending machine hums with soft blue light and moths circle a street lamp.

Elevated train tracks at dusk with the train just departed, its lights receding into the distance. The steel structure frames a view of the sunset city skyline while pigeons take flight from the vibrating rails.

Street dance battle circle under a highway overpass with portable LED lights and a boombox. Cars pass overhead creating rhythmic shadow patterns while the concrete walls bounce warm artificial light around the space.

Professional photography studio with a seamless gradient backdrop shifting from deep purple to hot pink. Ring lights create perfect circular catchlights while theatrical fog slowly fills the lower half of the frame.

Minimalist white studio with dramatic side lighting creating sharp shadows and highlights. A single colored gel light slowly rotates from blue to magenta while fine particles of dust catch the light beams.

LED video wall studio with panels displaying reactive colorful waveform patterns that pulse and flow. The reflective black floor mirrors the LED colors while subtle haze makes the light beams visible.

Dark studio with a grid of moving head lights creating sharp beam patterns overhead. The lights sweep and cross in choreographed movements while ground fog creates a floating cloud effect at floor level.

Retro-styled studio with a large neon sign glowing in cursive script on the back wall. Warm practical lights and vintage lamps create a cozy atmosphere while gentle lens flares drift across the scene.

High-fashion editorial studio with multiple large softbox lights and a silver metallic backdrop. Wind machines cause fabric drapes to billow gracefully while a subtle fan of colored light sweeps across the background.

Music video studio setup with floor-to-ceiling LED tube lights arranged in parallel rows. The tubes cycle through synchronized color gradients while volumetric haze creates visible shafts of colored light between them.

Infinite mirror room studio with LED strips creating the illusion of endless repeating lights in every direction. The lights slowly shift through the color spectrum while the reflections multiply into a dazzling infinity effect.
1980s arcade interior bathed in the glow of dozens of cabinet screens. Neon tube lights in pink and blue line the ceiling while pixel art animations reflect off the glossy black floor tiles.

Classic disco dance floor with illuminated colored squares that light up in sequential patterns. A giant mirror ball rotates overhead casting hundreds of moving light spots while fog catches the warm amber spotlights.

VHS aesthetic with tracking lines and chromatic aberration over a retro sunset gradient in orange and purple. Scan lines flicker across the image while a palm tree silhouette and grid landscape evoke synthwave nostalgia.

1970s roller disco rink with a wooden floor reflecting spinning colored lights. Funky neon signs flash on the walls while a disco ball scatters prismatic light patterns that rotate across every surface.

Retro diner interior at night with chrome fixtures reflecting red and turquoise neon signs. A jukebox glows warmly in the corner while rain streaks down the large windows and headlights of passing cars sweep across the walls.

Synthwave inspired digital landscape with a glowing neon grid stretching to the horizon under a massive setting sun. Mountains of wireframe geometry pulse with light while the sky shifts through retrowave purple and pink gradients.

1990s music video set with a CRT television wall displaying colorful static and retro graphics. Lava lamps bubble in the background while blacklight makes fluorescent posters and paint glow in vivid ultraviolet colors.

Art deco ballroom from the 1920s with golden geometric patterns on the walls and ceiling. Crystal chandeliers cast warm prismatic light while shadows of spinning ceiling fans create hypnotic rotating patterns on the marble floor.

New Year's Eve celebration with golden fireworks exploding across a dark sky in brilliant cascading patterns. Confetti and glitter rain down while champagne bubbles float upward and city lights sparkle below.

Gentle snowfall in a cozy winter village at night with warm light glowing from cottage windows. Street lamps illuminate the falling snowflakes while icicles glitter and a decorated Christmas tree twinkles in the town square.

Halloween haunted mansion interior with cobwebs swaying in a draft and candles flickering in ornate holders. Purple and green lighting casts eerie shadows on the walls while fog creeps along the floor and bats flutter past.

Spring flower festival with thousands of colorful blossoms surrounding a sunlit clearing. Petals drift on a gentle breeze while butterflies dance from flower to flower and soft golden sunlight creates dreamy lens flares.

Fourth of July spectacular with red, white, and blue fireworks bursting in rapid succession over a lake. The explosions reflect perfectly in the still water while sparklers create swirling light trails in the foreground.

Autumn harvest festival at twilight with hundreds of carved jack-o-lanterns lining a winding path. Each pumpkin glows with warm candlelight while fallen leaves swirl in gentle eddies and fairy lights drape between bare tree branches.

Valentine's Day scene with floating red and pink heart-shaped balloons drifting upward through soft rose-colored lighting. Rose petals fall like rain while bokeh lights in heart shapes twinkle in the warm, dreamy background.

Lunar New Year celebration with red paper lanterns swaying on strings across a festive street. Golden dragon decorations shimmer while firecrackers spark and pop, and red confetti drifts through the warm lantern glow.

Deep space nebula in vibrant purples, blues, and magentas with millions of stars twinkling at different rates. Cosmic dust clouds slowly swirl and shift while occasional shooting stars streak across the vast stellar canvas.

Underwater coral reef scene with bioluminescent sea creatures drifting past. Schools of glowing fish swim in synchronized patterns while soft blue-green light filters down from the surface and bubbles float upward.

Orbiting a ringed planet with its massive rings slowly rotating in the background. Stars wheel slowly past while the planet's atmosphere shows swirling storm patterns and the rings cast dramatic shadows on the cloud tops.

Deep ocean abyss with bioluminescent jellyfish pulsing with ethereal blue and pink light as they drift. Particles of marine snow fall slowly like underwater stars while distant deep-sea creatures flash with mysterious light.

Cosmic wormhole tunnel with swirling streams of starlight and energy spiraling inward. Colors shift from deep blue at the edges to brilliant white at the center while space debris and light particles accelerate through the vortex.

Serene underwater scene with massive ancient ruins partially covered in coral and sea plants. Shafts of sunlight penetrate the water from above creating moving caustic light patterns on the stone while fish swim between crumbling columns.

View from a space station window showing Earth slowly rotating below with city lights visible on the night side. The thin blue atmosphere glows at the horizon while satellites and distant stars drift past the window frame.

Surreal underwater kelp forest with enormous swaying fronds creating a cathedral-like canopy. Dappled sunlight filters through the kelp creating shifting patterns of light and shadow while sea otters and fish glide between the stalks.

Japanese temple courtyard at dusk with stone lanterns casting warm pools of light on a raked zen garden. Cherry blossom petals drift across the gravel patterns while paper lanterns sway gently on the wooden engawa.

Brazilian carnival street parade background with towering floats decorated in gold and feathers. Colorful streamers and confetti fill the air while sequined costumes catch the light of street lamps and camera flashes.

Venetian masquerade ball in an ornate palazzo with gilded mirrors and crystal chandeliers. Candlelight flickers on golden walls while masked figures in elaborate costumes waltz in soft focus behind ornate marble columns.

Traditional Korean hanok courtyard at night during a lantern festival. Hundreds of colorful paper lanterns float overhead casting warm multicolored light while a gentle breeze causes them to sway and their shadows to dance on the wooden floors.

Indian Diwali celebration with thousands of small oil lamps (diyas) arranged in intricate patterns on the ground. Sparklers create golden light trails while rangoli designs glow with vibrant powdered colors and floating lanterns rise into the night sky.

Moroccan riad courtyard with intricate zellige tile work reflecting the light of hanging brass lanterns. A central fountain gently splashes while the lanterns cast geometric shadow patterns that slowly rotate on the ornate walls.

Ancient Egyptian temple interior with massive hieroglyph-covered columns lit by flickering torchlight. Dust motes float through shafts of light from narrow windows while mysterious golden light pulses from deeper within the temple.

Chinese night market with rows of red lanterns illuminating food stalls and craft vendors. Steam rises from cooking stations while the lantern light reflects off hanging silk fabrics and animated neon signs buzz overhead.
